snippet: For each top athlete, a word. For Usain Bolt, it would have to be speed. For football's Lionel Messi: balance. For swimmer Michael Phelps: buoyant. But for the new king of men's tennis, Andy Murray, a quality both mental and physical springs to mi...
lead_paragraph: For each top athlete, a word. For Usain Bolt, it would have to be speed. For football's Lionel Messi: balance. For swimmer Michael Phelps: buoyant. But for the new king of men's tennis, Andy Murray, a quality both mental and physical springs to mind: fortitude.

headline.print_headline: Column: Tennis' 4th Beatle, Murray Is Paragon of Fortitude
headline.main: Column: Tennis' 4th Beatle, Murray Is Paragon of Fortitude
